subject: Re: [junit] use of setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: ... Far more likely in my experience is that I broke something in the application/library being tested, and that is indeed causing 101 tests to fail. It s rare
messageBody:
Cedric Beust wrote:

> And as I was saying earlier, you are probably so used to JUnit that when you
> read "101 FAILURES", you just *know* that it's not true that 101 tests
> failed. You know that only one of them failed (maybe a setUp or another
> test) and all the other ones are failing in cascade.

Far more likely in my experience is that I broke something in the
application/library being tested, and that is indeed causing 101 tests
to fail. It's rare to see a cascading error as a result of a setUp problem.

--
Elliotte Rusty Harold elharo@...
